title: Portillo Loses His Mind for Cheese
description:
Get 10 percent off your Barkbox subscription: http://www.barkbox.com/gameovergreggy

Full Episode Friday! Get it EARLY here! http://gameovergreggy.bandcamp.com

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=gameovergreggy

Buy our shirts! http://www.districtlines.com/gameovergreggy

Each and every Friday, Greg Miller, Colin Moriarty, Nick Scarpino, and Tim Gettys get together to talk. Each podcaster brings a topic to the table, and then, they go. TV, space, books, movies -- anything goes.

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys

transcript_chunks.text: what's up everybody it's me Greg Miller on the set of the game over Greggy show but you already knew that it's our weekly podcast we put up every uh you know all about it it's the game over Greggy show and you know there's a star who never gets enough credit on that show it's patillo the wiener dog right here the love of my life I love this little guy so much he's 9 years old and he's just a best thing that ever happened to me but here's the thing I travel the country doing all these different videos and doing all these different things I'm busy I play video games I eat a lot of food uh Patilla has all these old funky toys that I just he tears apart during the game over gregy I know we're getting to the toys I swear um but they're they're disgusting and I never replace them right so then I found out about BarkBox and so I signed up for it basically you sign up for this plan right and every it' be you can sign up every you get a monthly box from Bark Box okay we're done with oh I got to
